Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Barry Zito
Dear Sir,
Barry Zito has nothing more to prove at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an ERA of 1.55 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
